languages.text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл лежит на земле, устремив взгляд в бездонное небо Кетца Темера. Его таз неестественно вывернут, ноги не движутся, а из правой руки торчит обнаженный осколок кости. Кровь, тонкой струйкой пересекающая подбородок, даже не думает останавливаться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл лежит на земле, устремив взгляд в бездонное небо Кетца-аль Хета. Его таз неестественно вывернут, ноги не движутся, а из правой руки торчит обнаженный осколок кости. Кровь, тонкой струйкой пересекающая подбородок, даже не думает останавливаться".

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл лежит на земле, устремив взгляд в бездонное небо Кетца Темера. Его таз неестественно вывернут, ноги не движутся, а из правой руки торчит обнаженный осколок кости. Кровь, тонкой струйкой пересекающая подбородок, даже не думает останавливаться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs do not move, and his hand exposes a stark white bone shard. The blood, crossing his chin in a thin line, does not show any sign of stopping."

{n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs do not move, and his hand exposes a stark white bone shard. The blood, crossing his chin in a thin line, does not show any sign of stopping."

{n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

{n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale yace en el suelo, contemplando la inabarcable bóveda celeste de Quetza Temer. Su pelvis está retorcida en un ángulo antinatural, sus piernas no se mueven y un trozo de hueso sobresale de su brazo derecho. El hilo de sangre que mana por su barbilla no muestra indicios de cesar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale yace en el suelo, contemplando la inabarcable bóveda celeste de Quetza Temer. Su pelvis está retorcida en un ángulo antinatural, sus piernas no se mueven y su mano tiene el hueso expuesto. El hilo de sangre que mana por su barbilla no muestra indicios de cesar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔躺在地上，凝视着格扎尔特默广阔无垠的天空。他的骨盆不自然地扭曲着，双腿一动不动。尖锐的骨片刺穿了他的右臂，鲜血从他的下巴汩汩流出，形成了一条细流，没有要停止的迹象。{/n}|
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔躺在地上，凝视着格扎尔特默广阔无垠的天空。他的骨盆不自然地扭曲着，腿一动不动。尖锐的白骨碎片刺穿了他的手掌，鲜血从他的下巴汩汩流出，形成了一条细线，没有要停止的迹象。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Allongé au sol, Calligos Winterscale contemple le ciel de Quetza Temer. Son bassin est dans une position anormale, ses jambes ne bougent plus et un fragment d'os transperce son bras droit. Un mince filet de sang lui coule sur le menton sans discontinuer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Allongé au sol, Calligos Winterscale contemple le ciel de Quetza Temer. Son bassin est dans une position anormale, ses jambes ne bougent plus et un fragment d'os transperce son bras droit. Un mince filet de sang lui coule sur le menton sans discontinuer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは地面に横たわり、ケツァ・テメルの果てしない空を見つめている。骨盤は不自然にねじれ、脚は動かず、右腕には真っ白な骨の破片が露出している。顎から細くしたたる血は止まる気配を見せない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは地面に横たわり、ケツァ・テメルの果てしない空を見つめている。骨盤は不自然にねじれ、脚は動かず、手には真っ白な骨の破片が露出している。顎を細く横切る血は止まる気配を見せない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder liegt auf dem Boden und starrt in den endlosen Himmel über Quetza Temer. Sein Becken ist unnatürlich verrenkt, seine Beine bewegen sich nicht mehr und aus seinem rechten Arm ragt ein freigelegter Knochen. Blut läuft in einem dünnen Rinnsal über sein Kinn und macht keinen Anschein, zu versiegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder liegt auf dem Boden und starrt in den endlosen Himmel über Quetza Temer. Sein Becken ist auf unnatürliche Weise verschoben, seine Beine bewegen sich nicht und auf seiner Hand ragt ein weißer Knochensplitter. Das Blut, das sein Kinn in einer dünnen Linie quert, hört nicht auf zu rinnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale, gözlerini bitmek bilmeyen Quetza Temer göğüne dikmiş hâlde yerde yatıyor. Leğen kemiği anormal bir şekilde bükülmüş, bacakları hareket etmiyor, sağ kolunun bir kemiği ise dışarı fırlamış. Kan, ince bir dere misali çenesinden aşağı akıyor. Duracakmış gibi görünmüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale lies on the ground, staring into the endless sky of Quetza Temer. His pelvis is twisted unnaturally, his legs are not moving, and an exposed bone shard protrudes from his right arm. Blood streams down his chin in a thin rivulet with no sign of stopping.{/n}
